text:
@SkyNews So, following the results of this scientific study showing that Hydroxychloroquine has no effect on Covid-19 will those numpties who accused Boris Johnson of “personally murdering people by deliberately withholding the drug” now publicly apologise to him?

#NotHoldingMyBreath
